Lyric:
[by:spacedan]

[00:06.39]THUNDERSTRUCK
[00:06.87]AC/DC
[00:09.50](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!)
[00:12.50](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!)
[00:16.09](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!)
[00:19.57](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!)
[00:22.73](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!)
[00:26.76](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:30.75](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:34.41](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:37.56](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:41.63](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:45.21](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunder!)
[00:48.73](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!) Thunder!
[00:52.49](Thunder!)
[00:57.91]Thunder!
[01:01.49](Thunder!)
[01:05.07]I was caught,
[01:06.85]In the middle of a railroad track! (Thunder!)
[01:10.52]I looked 'round,
[01:13.48]And I knew there was no turnin' back! (Thunder!)
[01:15.69]My mind raced,
[01:20.71]And I thought, "What could I do?" (Thunder!)
[01:26.27]And I knew,
[01:27.87]There was no help, no help from you! (Thunder!)
[01:37.47]Sound of the drums...
[01:41.06]Beatin' in my heart!
[01:42.88]The thunder of guns, yeah...
[01:44.71]Tore me apart!
[01:45.42]You've been... thunderstruck!
[01:58.59]Rode down the highway,
[02:00.78]Broke the limit, we hit the town!
[02:05.38]Went through to Texas,
[02:08.00]Yeah, Texas, and we had some fun!
[02:11.69]We met some girls,
[02:14.35]some dancers who gave a good time!
[02:20.12]Broke all the rules, played all the fools,
[02:27.91]Yeah-yeah, they - they - they blew our mind!
[02:31.77]And I was shakin' at the knees!
[02:34.55]Could I come again, please?
[02:36.53]Yeah, the ladies were too kind!
[02:39.64]You've been...
[02:40.61]You've been... thunderstruck! Thunderstruck!
[02:45.86]Yeah-yeah-yeah, thunderstruck!
[02:49.57]Ooh, thunderstruck!
[03:00.78]Yeah...
[03:00.92]I was shakin' at the knees!
[03:07.78]Could I come again, please?
[03:10.57]Ow!
[03:26.02]SOLO
[03:28.12]Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah...
[03:30.82]Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah...
[03:33.52]Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah...
[03:37.11]Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah...
[03:41.70]Ooh...
[03:43.57]
[03:44.63]Thunderstruck! Thunderstruck!
[03:49.43]Yeah-yeah-yeah, thunderstruck!
[03:50.44]Thunderstruck!
[03:52.15]Yeah-yeah-yeah, said:
[03:58.95]Yeah, it's alright!
[04:01.07]We're - doin' fine!
[04:04.50]Yeah, it's alright!
[04:06.04]We're - doin' fine!
[04:10.77]So fine!
[04:14.66]Thunderstruck!
[04:14.82]Yeah-yeah-yeah, thunderstruck!
[04:15.73]Thunderstruck! (Thunderstruck!)
[04:17.90]Whoa, baby-baby! (Thunderstruck!)
[04:24.54]You've been thunderstruck!
[04:25.85](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah, thunderstruck!)
[04:31.10](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!) Thunderstruck!
[04:35.46](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!) Thunderstruck!
[04:37.20](Rah-rah-rah-rah-rah!) You've been thunderstruck!
[04:39.47]
